hero.title:
Your workspace is
always in sync.
hero.description: insync allows teams to organize their workspace and always be up-to-date. With AI's help.

members.error: Couldn't send invites, something went wrong

invite.title: Join {organizationName} organization on insync.
invite.description:
insync allows teams to organize their workspace and always be up-to-date.
With AI's help.
invite.invited-you: {name} invited you to collaborate in {organization} organization.
invite.error-toast: Couldn't accept invitation, something went wrong

sidebar.empty: Pretty empty around here. Create your first organization to start.
sidebar.title: Organizations

organization-settings.title: Settings
organization-settings.delete-subtitle: Delete the entire organization including all associated data
organization-settings.delete-subtitle-2: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed
organization-settings.delete-warning-1: Are you sure you want to delete the {name} organization?
organization-settings.delete-warning-2: This action will delete the organization and all associated data, and is irreversible.
organization-settings.delete-error-toast: Couldn't delete organization, something went wrong
organization-settings.leave-subtitle: You can leave this organization now, and always come back if someone invites you.
organization-settings.leave-warning-1: Are you sure you want to leave the {name} organization?
organization-settings.leave-warning-2: This action is reversible, you can join the organization again via an invite.
organization-settings.leave-success-toast: You are no longer a member of {name}
organization-settings.leave-error-toast: Couldn't leave organization, something went wrong

create-organization.error: Couldn't create organization, something went wrong
create-organization.title: Create organization
create-organization.name: Give your organization a name
create-organization.invite: Invite people by email (this can be done later)
